title: Ragasiyamai Song Lyrics Dum Dum Dum
stanzas:
Ragasiyamaai ragasiyamaai
punnagaithaal porul ennavo
Ragasiyamaai ragasiyamaai
punnagaithaal porul ennavo

solla thudikkum vaarthai kirangum
thondai kuliyil oosi irangum
ilai vadivil idhayam irukkum
malai vadivil adhuvum kanakkum

sirithu sirithu siraiyile
sikkikolla adam pidikkum
ho hoho ho hoho ho hoho

Ragasiyamaai ragasiyamaai
punnagaithaal porul ennavo
adhisayamaai avasaramaai
mozhi tholaindhaal porul ennavo

solla thudikkum vaarthai kirangum
thondai kuliyil oosi irangum
ilai vadivil idhayam irukkum
malai vadivil adhuvum kanakkum

sirithu sirithu siraiyile
sikkikolla adam pidikkum
ho hoho ho hoho ho hoho

Nilam neer kaatrile
minsarangal pirandhidum
kadhal tharum minsaramo
prabanjathai kadanthidum

nijamaai ennai theendinaal
nijamaai ennai theendinaal
paniyai paniyai uruginen

oliyaau nee ennai theendinaal
nuraiyaai unnul karaigiren
kadhal idhu thaane
vandhaa yeno ularalgalthaano

Velli tharai polave
en idhayam irundhadhu
mella vandhu un viral
kadhal endru ezhudhudhu

orunaal kadhal en vasal
orunaal kadhal en vasal
varavaa varavava kettadhu
marunaal kadhal en veettukkul
adimai saasanam neettudhu

adhuvo adhu idhuvo
udhu yedhuvo adhai
naam ariyomae.

Ragasiyamaai ragasiyamaai
punnagaithaal porul ennavo
avasaramaai avasaramaai
mozhi tholaindhaal porul ennavo

solla thudikkum vaarthai kirangum
thondai kuliyil oosi irangum
ilai vadivil idhayam irukkum
malai vadivil adhuvum kanakkum

sirithu sirithu siraiyile
sikkikolla adam pidikkum
ho hoho ho hoho ho hoho
